'''The Spindle Man''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A peculiar kind of merchant inhabiting [Delver's Row](/delversRow/), The Spindle Man specializes in secrets, exotic items, and yearns for the secrets of the Old City.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Accessories, scrolls, and other. Unique items include [Sisyfo's Stone](/sisyfosStone/), [Spindle Man's Grimoire](/spindleMansGrimoire/), [Ring of Regeneration](/ringOfRegeneration/),  [Whitewitch Mask](/whitewitchMask/), and [Obsidian Lamp Figurine](/obsidianLampFigurineDeadfire/).
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/)
|none            = 
|other           = * Killing [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/) during [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/) gives you a 10% discount on all items.
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/): Can be eliminated for [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/) in lieu of paying for the medicine. Alternatively he can be informed of [Ernezzo](/ernezzo/)'s plan and told of a secret entrance, after which wants to have him killed for "special business". Doing so will get you a discount at his store, but will not result in a change to his inventory.

##  Notes 

* The Spindle Man refers to Ernezzo as "she"
